mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO FIELD ( FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_AREA, FIELD_DATE, FIELD_COUNT, FIELD_SIZE, PARKING, MATCH_GENDER, SHOES, MANAGER, MATCH_LEVEL, MATCH_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, MATCH_PAY, CATEGORY_NUM ) VALUES (
SEQ_FIELD.NEXTVAL, #{fieldName}, #{fieldArea}, #{fieldDate}, #{fieldCount}, #{fieldSize}, #{parking}, #{matchGender}, #{shoes}, #{manager}, #{matchLevel}, #{matchType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{matchPay}, #{categoryNum} )

INSERT INTO FIELD_IMG ( FIELD_IMG_NO, FIELD_URL, FIELD_ORIGIN_NAME, FIELD_CHANGE_NAME, DLELTE_FIELD_IMG, FIELD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_FIELD_IMG.NEXTVAL, #{fieldUrl}, #{fieldOriginName}, #{fieldChangeName}, 'N', SEQ_FIELD.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: SELECT FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_AREA, FIELD_COUNT, FIELD_DATE, MATCH_GENDER, MATCH_LEVEL, START_TIME, CATEGORY_NUM FROM FIELD WHERE CATEGORY_NUM = #{categoryNum} AND FIELD_AREA LIKE '%' || #{fieldArea} || '%' AND MATCH_GENDER = #{matchGender} AND MATCH_LEVEL = #{matchLevel} AND FIELD_DATE = #{fieldDate}

SELECT FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_AREA, FIELD_DATE, FIELD_ENROLL_DATE, FIELD_COUNT, FIELD_SIZE, PARKING, MATCH_GENDER, SHOES, MANAGER, MATCH_LEVEL, MATCH_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, MATCH_PAY, CATEGORY_NUM FROM FIELD WHERE FIELD_NO = #{fieldNo}
SELECT FIELD_NO, COUNT(*) as "FIELD_COUNT" FROM RESERVATION GROUP BY FIELD_NO
SELECT FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, CATEGORY_NUM FROM FIELD WHERE FIELD_NAME like '%'||#{searchMain}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( RES_NO, RES_DATE, RES_USER_NO, FIELD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RESERVATION.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{resUserNo}, #{fieldNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT FIELD_IMG_NO, FIELD_URL, FIELD_ORIGIN_NAME, FIELD_CHANGE_NAME FROM FIELD_IMG WHERE FIELD_NO = #{fieldNo}
SELECT RES_NO, RES_USER_NO, FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_DATE, START_TIME, CATEGORY_NUM FROM RESERVATION JOIN FIELD USING (FIELD_NO) WHERE RES_USER_NO = #{resUserNo} ORDER BY FIELD_DATE, START_TIME

SELECT FIELD_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_AREA, FIELD_DATE, FIELD_ENROLL_DATE, FIELD_COUNT, FIELD_SIZE, PARKING, MATCH_GENDER, SHOES, MANAGER, MATCH_LEVEL, MATCH_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, MATCH_PAY, CATEGORY_NUM FROM FIELD WHERE MANAGER = #{userName} AND TO_TIMESTAMP(FIELD_DATE || ' ' || END_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') < SYSTIMESTAMP

SELECT MB.USER_NAME, MB.USER_NO, RES.RES_NO, RES.RES_DATE, RES.RES_USER_NO, RES.FIELD_NO, SPO.SPORT_LEVEL, SPO.SPORT_SCORE, SPO.SPORT_COUNT, SPO.SPORT_SMILE, SPO.SPORT_YELLOW, SPO.SPORT_RED, SPO.STYLE, SPO.SKILL, SPO.USER_NO, SPO.CATEGORY_NUM FROM SPORTINFO "SPO" JOIN RESERVATION "RES" ON(RES.RES_USER_NO = SPO.USER_NO) JOIN MEMBER "MB" ON(MB.USER_NO = SPO.USER_NO) WHERE FIELD_NO = #{fieldNo} AND CATEGORY_NUM = #{categoryNum}
